attributes.action: Make school places for catchment only residents
attributes.background: We had our child at school for one year in f1 .then moved in his school catchment lost appeal now we have to travel out of catchment at our expense .when we could otherwise walk 5mins to his previous school

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
